title: The Journey of Marcus David Alo
content: Welcome to my journey! I'm Marcus, a full stack web developer specializing in the MERN stack. Let me take you through my adventure in the world of web development.

title: The Start
content: My journey began when I decided to enroll in the Kodego Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp. It was a challenging yet rewarding experience that equipped me with the skills I needed to succeed in the tech industry.

title: Learning the Basics
content: In the early stages of the bootcamp, I learned about HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. These are the building blocks of web development and gave me a solid foundation to build upon.

title: Diving into the MERN Stack
content: As the bootcamp progressed, I was introduced to the MERN stack - MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. This powerful combination of technologies allowed me to create complex, dynamic websites.

title: Building Projects
content: To put my skills to the test, I built several projects during the bootcamp. These projects ranged from simple static websites to complex web applications with user authentication and database integration.

title: Graduation and Beyond
content: After months of hard work and learning, I graduated from the bootcamp. But the journey didn't stop there. I continue to learn and grow as a developer, always looking for new challenges and opportunities.

title: What I am Currently Doing
content: Post-bootcamp, I've been working on several pet projects mainly for my own convenience, such as a frame extractor for videos using Python, and a savings tracker using React. I'm also currently in the process of self-learning about AI and ML, primarily focusing on Language Model Learning (LLM) and Image Generation with Stable Diffusion.

title: The Future
content: Looking ahead, I'm excited about the future of web development. With emerging technologies like AI and blockchain, there's always something new to learn and explore.

title: Get in Touch
content: If you'd like to learn more about my work or if you have a project you'd like to discuss, feel free to get in touch. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.

title: Thank You
content: Thank you for taking the time to read about my journey. I hope it gives you a glimpse into who I am as a developer and a person. I look forward to what the future holds and the exciting challenges it will bring.
